Summary: Flashing small sphere strobe effect taking pictures of our car near White Sands Missle Range
divs: Sighting DetailsIn the summer of 2007, we were traveling through New Mexico toward Los Angeles, California, when we took a wrong turn down Interstate 25 between Alburque New Mexico and El Paso, Texas. This is my story.
